responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "252CE1A041C27454DE9429ABBC0AE6E7", "Papa -- Mama says we won\'t be able to visit anymore after we leave through the portal. Didn\'t feel right to leave you alone, so I\'m leaving you my bravest toy soldier to help you and the others here fight off the demons coming for us. I\'m getting too old for toys anyway. --Love Always, Troy")
name: DD_SQ_0005_MarredLetter_6
